 Executive Board Reporting Software (EBRS)
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=5FFE325B-B3B2-E17E-164EA53820F089F7
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=5FFE325B-B3B2-E17E-164EA53820F089F7
 Invalid Date
 Supplier(s)
This RFP seeks Proposals from potential suppliers for the supply, implementation and integration of a Executive Board Reporting Software (EBRS) to support NSW Board Management. This system will be used on a statewide basis by Local Health Districts and Pillars. Note that transition of these entities will be via a staggered approach

 The NSW Department of Education proposes to offer broadcast rights in the annual Schools Spectacular Event, commencing with the 2024 event to be held on 29/30 November at the Qudos Bank Arena.

 Telecommunications Purchasing Arrangement V2.0
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=C8D5604D-C2A1-D696-D7C0CE7F8A255B9E
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=C8D5604D-C2A1-D696-D7C0CE7F8A255B9E
 Invalid Date
 Department of Customer Service (DCS) is planning to replace the all-of-government Telecommunications Purchasing Arrangement (TPA) procurement panel prior to its expiry in June 2025, and is seeking feedback on the proposed approach from suppliers of enterprise telecommunications services.

 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=5E2021C6-C21C-4927-905009F4B9F3D947
 Invalid Date
 ID Support NSW is looking for a Managed Service provider that can help with Salesforce CRM, Telephony, and Marketing Cloud maintenance and support, also supporting ongoing development of ID Support NSW Salesforce strategy this will be for 1 year with 2 year optional extension.
 


 Operational Telecommunications Equipment, Infrastructure and Services (ITS2573)

 /scheme/2F4D6FCB-A284-8C44-137434F7292ED668

 Prequalification Scheme: ICT Services
 /scheme/6B1F91AE-B3CC-0F0E-17267D5EF7BCEB9E
 /scheme/6B1F91AE-B3CC-0F0E-17267D5EF7BCEB9E

 The ICT Services Scheme is mandated for all suppliers who deliver ICT goods and services to the NSW Government.
 


 Request for Proposal for Transport Equip Applications Development Services Panel
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=8C8A1C78-F1E0-D6C7-09C68ADE53DA6FEA
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=8C8A1C78-F1E0-D6C7-09C68ADE53DA6FEA
 Invalid Date
 TfNSW must fulfill its continuous need for applications development to support Transport Equip, an online system based on SAP technology used to manage business transactions for organizations that do business with Transport agencies. The current panel arrangement is set to expire in April 2024 and is no longer suitable to meet TfNSW's evolving requirements including the recent upgrades to the Transport Equip system to S/4 HANA. As a result, TfNSW needs to establish a new panel of professional service providers that can effectively cater to TfNSW's application development needs.
 


 Provision of Goods & Services for Provider Access (PA) switch replacement program

 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=91F5D522-AFB5-6C0B-220567067CD6B533
 Invalid Date
 Sydney Trains is seeking responses to procure Provider Access (PA) switches, hardware maintenance services and configuration services over the span of 4 financial years.
